Class ReinforcementPhase

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.controller.ReinforcementPhase
public class ReinforcementPhase
extends java.lang.Object
Reinforcement class provides functions to perform Reinforcement phase in Game

rohan

    beginReinforcement function to start the reinforcement phase It checks all 3 rules for reinforcement in the game and decides how many number of army plater will get for this turn.

    • beginReinforcement

      public void beginReinforcement​(Player player)
      beginReinforcement function to start the reinforcement phase It checks all 3 rules for reinforcement in the game and decides how many number of army plater will get for this turn.
      Parameters:
      player - Player

    • assign_army

      public void assign_army​(Player player)

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Method to make the sets of countries in each continents - will be use later to check the 2nd rule of the reinforcement phase.

    • exchangeCardsForArmy

      private void exchangeCardsForArmy​(Player player, java.lang.String[] countryNameOfCards)
      Method to execute the 3rd rule: to exchange cards with army, and remove those cards from player's cardList
      Parameters:
      player - for player
      countryNameOfCards - for cards of country

    • countryBelongsToPlayer

      private boolean countryBelongsToPlayer​(Player player, java.lang.String countryName)
      Parameters:
      player - the player object to be checked whether he owns the given country
      countryName - the country to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the player owns the country

    • reinforceArmy

      public void reinforceArmy​(Player player, java.lang.String countryName, int armyNumber)
      function for command:- reinforce countryname, number (number is army to be placed in that country)
      Parameters:
      countryName - for country name
      armyNumber - number of armies
      player - for player entity

    • PlaceArmy

      private void PlaceArmy​(java.lang.String countryName, int armyNumber)
      Parameters:
      countryName - the country to be assigned an army
      armyNumber - the number of armies to be assigned
